sentences.sentence: At the end of the evening, one of these girls will be crowned "Little Miss Sunshine"!
sentences.translation: 今晚结束时，其中的一位女孩将会荣膺“阳光小美女”的称号！

sentences.sentence: It didn’t matter how big our house was; it mattered that there was love in it.
sentences.translation: 房子多大并不重要，重要的是家中有爱。

sentences.sentence: Love is what binds us, through fair or stormy weather.
sentences.translation: 爱将我们紧紧相连，共度风风雨雨。

sentences.sentence: I hope you have a very happy New Year.
sentences.translation: 我希望你能拥有一个快乐的新年。

sentences.sentence: And multitudes have perished spiritually for the lack of another's belief in them.
sentences.translation: 而许多人因为无法获得别人的信任而在精神上形同死亡。
